page.title: 15TRADE AND EMPLOYMENT IN DUNS
page.content: THE MAIN TYPE OF COMPANIES IN DUNS ARE{FAMILY COMPANIES}WHO OPERATE ON A 6 DAY A WEEK BASIS.THE COMPANIES WHO MAKE THE MOST MONEY ARE CAR COMPANIES.THERE ARE 4 GARAGES IN OUR BLOCK.THE SHOPS IN OUR 12 SQUARES ARE USUALLY BASED IN DUNS.THERE ARE ONLY ABOUT 4 BUSINESSES THAT ARE IN OTHER PLACES APART FROM DUNS AND 2 OF THEM ARE NATIONAL.WE HAVE 2 CLOTHES SHOPS IN DUNS AND THESE ARE BOTH FAIRLY NEW TO DUNS.WE HAVE ONE VIDEO SHOP WHERE YOU CAN HIRE VIDEOS FOR Â£2.00 OR Â£2.50 A NIGHT.THE BIGGEST SHOP IN DUNS IS THE{CO_OP}.THE MOST POPULAR SHOPS ARE SWEET SHOPS. HERE ARE EXAMPLES OF SHOPS IN DUNS: CROALL BRYSON - CAR SALESMAN; TODDS - SWEET SHOP;MARLEN _ CLOTHES SHOP;FINNIES-NEWSAGENT;CO-OP-GENERAL STORE.
